storyInfo: Deszcz is more than used to defending the bad guys, but who's to say what makes a bad guy?

attributes.text: Kazimierz's current legal system is objectively a byproduct of her historical development, one with indisputable practical value and objective necessity...

The division of judicial and executive powers between the National Council and the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi has ensured that the legal system maintains a rectifiable balance. The inevitable clash between the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi and the General Chamber of Commerce became a kind of insurance to this homeostasis...

But when the topic of 'justice' is brought up, as well as when seeking any kind of deontological ethical foothold in Kazimierz's current legal system, we must consider the ever-encroaching, foundational influence that capitalism has on the values of the general public...
—Excerpts from Deszcz's graduation thesis, 'The Conflict, Reconciliation, and Imagined Future of Kazimierz's Present Legislature with Regards to Trade Capital'

attributes.content: ...Let us turn our attention to the string of events that occurred at Arena No. 4 a few days ago.
attributes.name: Voice on Television

attributes.content: Renowned knight 'Razor' Zorn of the Silveredge Knightclub continued to unleash his relentless attacks and critically wounded his opponent, who has yet to regain consciousness.
attributes.name: Voice on Television

attributes.content: The prosecutor's office has brought multiple charges against Zorn, including aggravated assault and disorderly knightsports conduct. A court hearing is set to be held.
attributes.name: Voice on Television

attributes.content: The injured knight, Roth, is a rising new star in the Kazimierz Major.
attributes.name: Voice on Television

attributes.content: From the knightsports arena of a remote village, he climbed all the way up the ladder to the Grand Knight Territory, and has obtained excellent results in the recent preliminaries.
attributes.name: Voice on Television

attributes.content: According to his attending physician, it is highly likely that he will never regain his mobility. Sadly, this may be the end of the road for our fledgling young knight.
attributes.name: Voice on Television

attributes.content: Now for an interview with Roth's wife...
attributes.name: Voice on Television

attributes.content: Mr. Zorn. The competition clip we just played is from the official feed of Arena No. 4 on the day of the competition.
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: As can be seen in the video, there is no doubt that you raised your hand and landed what could have been a fatal blow on your opponent after the judge had sounded the whistle to end the match. Do you dispute this?
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: You do have the right to remain silent, but I also have the right to continue asking questions.
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: The medical report that I am now submitting to the court is from the hospital where Mr. Roth is currently receiving medical care. As shown in the report, the injuries he sustained were all caused during the match—in other words, you caused them.
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: Do you dispute this?
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: Your record also shows that you have had multiple match violations, in addition to a violent incident outside the arena.
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: Likewise, the evidence shows that the knightclub that you belong to, Silveredge, once attempted to recruit Mr. Roth, only to be rebuffed.
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: Did you receive any instructions to cause bodily harm to Mr. Roth?
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: Objection. The prosecutor is asking a leading question.
attributes.name: Defense Attorney

attributes.content: Sustained. Change the question.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Your Honor, I believe the nature of this case could not be more apparent. Out of pure malice, the defendant attacked a kind and innocent competition knight, inflicting upon him irreparable harm.
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: To uphold the sanctity of the law and the continued development of our national sport, I ask for the maximum possible penalty.
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: No further questions, your honor.
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: The defense, if you would.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Mr. Zorn, during the match, did you get a clear signal that the match had come to an end?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: No, I did not.
attributes.name: Zorn

attributes.content: How awful...
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: It took so much work for that young man to make it all the way here to the Grand Knight Territory. It was a chance for him to change his fate... Do you realize how many voices outside are sympathizing with him right now?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: What a sick joke. Every year, hundreds of knights die in the underground arenas, but the media and the spectators picked a single unlucky sod to blow all out of proportion.
attributes.name: Razor Knight

attributes.content: Enough of this nonsense... You're supposed to be my lawyer!
attributes.name: Razor Knight

attributes.content: So you are aware that I'm here to help you, and not just a fan hoping for an autograph?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: The Silveredge K.C. thinks this is going to severely damage their reputation. Which is why they're spending huge sums of money to hire a defense lawyer for you. Or to be precise, to calm things down.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: In the end, getting you out of this mess is a way for them to save face. Your situation and my fees are both outside of our direct control. You do know what I mean by that, right?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: So, try to calm your temper a little. It'll make it easier for the both of us if we can work together. Got it?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Fine...
attributes.name: Razor Knight

attributes.content: I looked into your files. Over your last three years of matches, you've accumulated a total of thirteen citations for knightsports rules violations. Though your ferocious style has also earned you more than a few fans.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Not to mention your other violent clashes and the rumors that you're cheating on your taxes... None of these are really things I can use.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: 'Style'? I'm just playing the character my knightclub wants me to.
attributes.name: Razor Knight

attributes.content: I was just going to teach that village boy a lesson... I didn't even notice the signal that marked the end of the match.
attributes.name: Razor Knight

attributes.content: Do you think anyone cares about that?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: From the masses' perspective, this is a case of a violent knight-noble deliberately injuring a commoner that everyone looked up to as an inspiration. Everyone's champing at the bit to see this villain brought to trial.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: At this point, defending yourself is only going to have the opposite effect.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: So if I plead guilty, what kind of deal can you cut? A fine? Imprisonment?
attributes.name: Razor Knight

attributes.content: I'm okay with anything... As long as my title is intact, as long as I can keep fighting in the Major, I can rise again—
attributes.name: Razor Knight

attributes.content: Let's not get ahead of ourselves. As a professional defense attorney, I suggest you take all my advice and follow my strategy.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Your job is very simple. No matter what they ask you, you keep your mouth shut. Then, you answer my questions the way I tell you to. Painless, right?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: If I work with you... what kind of outcome can you get me?
attributes.name: Razor Knight

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: How about a 'not guilty'?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Your Honor, this is a report of Mr. Zorn's physical examination, dated the day of the competition—likewise from the hospital where Mr. Roth was sent.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: It clearly states that Mr. Zorn had a mild concussion because of the injuries he sustained during the match.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: In other words, given the situation, it is highly likely that the defendant was unable to clearly hear the whistle or the announcer.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Don't make me laugh... An ambiguous report like this proves nothing!
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: Prosecutor, are you trying to make a judgment on the judge's behalf?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Silence. Order in the court.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Allow me to continue.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Mr. Zorn, what is your appraisal of Mr. Roth's competitive abilities?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: He's a very strong knight, and a lot more skilled than me. His recent matches have been outstanding, too. I thought I didn't stand a chance.
attributes.name: Zorn

attributes.content: That does seem to be the case, going by the scores. Mr. Roth's ranking this season is much higher than yours. The betting odds prior to the match also suggest this.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: This also implies that you believe Mr. Roth did not perform as well as he usually does during the match. Is there perhaps a reason he might want to lose the match on purpose?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Objection! Irrelevant!
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: Overruled. Continue.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Your Honor, as Mr. Roth is unable to appear in person, please allow me to bring in our witness.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Ma'am, you are Mr. Roth's wife, correct?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Yes... I am...
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: Two days before the match, an official account belonging to the Goldhelmet K.C. transferred ten thousand marks to Mr. Roth's personal account. What do you know about this money?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: I pieced together all the offers that each knightclub made for Mr. Roth before his injury, as well as rumors of their private talks. Everything I could find, it's all here.
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: As reliable as ever! Here's your reward, same as always.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Hm... ten wins out of eleven matches in the preliminaries. No wonder so many clubs are trying to get in his good graces... If I'd known about this, I would've bet on him back then.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: He's a young man with hardly any experience other than martial training. He doesn't know the first thing about the rules of the commercial side of knightsports.
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: Given all the clubs tussling over him, if he'd hyped up his impoverished background and his image as a family man even a little, he'd probably be making several times what he does.
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: Going just by the files you gave me, he's almost like the protagonist of a classical knight novel. Have characters like him been popular in the Major lately?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: I've met him a couple times. He's an honest, decent guy. Always fights fair and square. Even after he made it big, his relationship with his wife wasn't shaken one bit. I've never heard anything negative about him, either.
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: It's a damn shame this happened to him.
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: Thanks. I'll gather the rest of what I need through the law firm's channels.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Are you using this to prep for Razor Knight's case? You're actually trying to get him out of this mess?
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: You... You'd best be careful.
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: Things are looking pretty dicey right now. The boss of Silveredge is staying out of the public eye. If you get caught, don't let anyone know I gave you this intel.
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: Don't worry, I won't. Silveredge wouldn't be spending this much money if they weren't feeling the heat.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Is there even anything to dispute with this case...? That maniac Razor did it with everyone watching, and Roth's injuries are real. How are you supposed to fight a case like this?
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: Nothing to dispute?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Goldhelmet, the knightclub that's been chummiest with Roth, gave this rookie a huge sum of money before they were anywhere close to signing a contract with him. Isn't that a bit too generous of them?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: They had just got their top knight poached by another club. They're in a rush to secure new talent. Probably just their idea of sincerity.
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: But if I remember correctly, aren't they are also Silveredge's mortal enemy?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Wait, are you saying... You know that's not true!
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: Guess I'm lucky the trial's happening before Roth wakes up, huh?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Razor's a scumbag... You know that!
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: Maybe, but scumbag or not, he's my client.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: You've changed, Deszcz.
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: What's this? Weren't we having a cozy teatime chat? Why are you giving me that serious look?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: I still remember when you first bought information from me. You were an intern, and trying to win a retired campaign knight his pension, pro bono... How time flies.
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: Wow, I've completely forgotten about that. Although the case does sound familiar, now that you mention it.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: I really should thank you. If it weren't for your info, I'd probably have lost a number of my cases.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Yeah, I've heard rumors about your cases...
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: The Grand Knight Territory is a rotten place... And I make my living selling gossip, so maybe I'm not one to talk, but...
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: You're not enjoying this, are you Deszcz?
attributes.name: Knight Scout

attributes.content: Mr. Zorn, as a member of the Silveredge Knightclub, could you explain to me your knightclub's relationship with the Goldhelmet Knightclub?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: I'm sure anyone who knows anything about the Kazimierz Major knows that Goldhelmet and Silveredge are knightclubs of similar scale. They've always been business rivals, and have had several clashes.
attributes.name: Zorn

attributes.content: In other words, any negative impact on the Silveredge K.C.'s reputation would indirectly lead to more profits for Goldhelmet, correct?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Objection! The defense is going off on a tangent. This question is irrelevant to the case!
attributes.name: Prosecutor

attributes.content: Sustained. Change the question.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: My apologies. I still have one last question.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Mr. Zorn, this is the description of the match from the prosecutor's indictment, and I quote, 'Even though his opponent could no longer fight back, he continued to unleash attacks of sufficient force to cause his opponent significant injuries.'
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Do you agree with this statement?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: I disagree.
attributes.name: Zorn

attributes.content: It's not apparent from the match's recordings, but I could see it very well from my perspective.
attributes.name: Zorn

attributes.content: When Roth was on the ground, his crossbow was still aimed at me.
attributes.name: Zorn

attributes.text: The paper has a novel concept, but the demonstration section is too subjective and contains too many of the author's negative predications. Dissertations should stick to the main arguments and focus on the details. Avoid empty, unrealistic musings.
The committee has determined that this dissertation requires further improvement.
Addendum: Why abandon the topic of 'legal protections for the commercial image of competition knights'? Do you know how many other students are fighting over it?

attributes.content: I will now announce the verdict.
attributes.name: Judge

attributes.content: Thank you, Miss! I should've expected nothing less from the Longrein Law Firm's award-winning lawyer!
attributes.name: Razor Knight

attributes.content: Let's save the pleasantries. I expect your knightclub to pay the bill within three days.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: By the way, the trial may be over, but out of consideration for your reputation, I suggest you keep a low profile.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Of course, of course. You took care of this huge pain in the rear for me. Lawyer fees aside, I really need to express my gratitude one of these days!
attributes.name: Razor Knight

attributes.content: You were right. Those screaming idiots are just a bunch of morons who know nothing. The law is fair and just!
attributes.name: Razor Knight

attributes.content: I won't forget you. If I ever run into this kind of trouble again, you'll be my first choice! Goodbye!
attributes.name: Razor Knight

attributes.content: Razor! Razor!
attributes.name: Passionate Cheers

attributes.content: Throngs of fans surround the court's front door. The newly-acquitted knight waves his arms as he walks toward the crowd, like a hero returning in triumph.
Beautiful victory. Congratulations. Ms. Deszcz.
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: The chain of evidence was still somewhat crude, but going solely by the results, you've met our expectations. Very well done.
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Thanks for the compliment, Director.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: I saw a few familiar faces in the jury. It didn't matter who was on the case, right? How can I take all the credit?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: We may be on the phone, but there are certain things that should be left unsaid.
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Mm... Sorry...
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: In any case, with the Razor Knight case brought to a close, I don't want to hear his name ever again, especially not for a retrial. I take it there will be no issue with that?
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Don't worry. I'll take care of the follow-up just fine.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Good. You can get some rest until your next case.
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Whew...
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: My husband did no such thing!
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: Oh, Mrs. Roth.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Thank you for coming to testify today. Did you need anything else?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Why did you slander my husband like that...
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: He's already had to suffer so much... Did you have to strip him of his dignity, too?!
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: Ms. Deszcz, is there a problem here?
attributes.name: Security Officer

attributes.content: ...No, it's fine. I ran into an acquaintance, that's all.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Sorry, ma'am. The trial is over, and you should've told this to the judge and the jury earlier.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Now, if you'll excuse me.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Aren't you ashamed to distort the truth like that?!
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: What gives you the right to twist the facts? What gives you the right to toy with other peoples' lives?!
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: ...Do you think what you know is the real truth?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: If you really want to chat, let's find somewhere else.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Roth said... his greatest wish is to stand in the arena of the Major, and prove to everyone the glory and dignity that knights should have.
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: He's always worked towards that...
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: Then you must not be very familiar with your husband's work.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: What do you mean...?
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: I received some news that wasn't related to the case. Interested?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Two days before the match, the Goldhelmet K.C. transferred a sum of money to Roth's personal account. Then, a substantial amount was transferred out of that account.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: This money was then transferred through multiple accounts in succession. In the end, it was all used to place a bet on Razor winning his match against Roth.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: How could that be...?
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: I don't know the details of the deal between Goldhelmet and Mr. Roth, but it's not so hard to guess. As for Razor Knight, his involvement was an unfortunate accident.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: It seems your husband isn't the knight novel protagonist everyone makes him out to be. Although that does make him more relatable.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: No way... That's not the kind of man he is...
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: If not for the accident, do you know how much those 'lottery tickets' of his would've been worth, compared to the prize money for winning a match?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: In the end, both Razor Knight and Mr. Roth were puppets on strings.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: I don't think anyone has the right to criticize him. No one can see the stars above until all the neon lights are turned off.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: A lonely lamp lights up the corner of the narrow alley. Dark shadows extend in both directions with no end in sight.
The lighted signs of the tall buildings in the distance together form a curtain that blocks out the night sky.
Isn't there some other way...?
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: Isn't what they're doing... a crime?
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: Well, there is a way...
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: There's only so much cake to go around. Everyone wants a slice, but this also means each faction only has a limited influence on the court. There's definitely a way to break through, we just need to find it.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: That is, if someone is willing to stand up and declare war. As for the risks...
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: What else do I have to lose...?
attributes.name: Timid Woman

attributes.content: Here's my card. Once you've made up your mind, give me a call.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Once you've decided to make those who toy with others pay the price for it.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: Also, I'm sorry about what happened to your husband.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.text: Thank you for your suggestions. I will continue to edit my draft.

attributes.content: Two months later...
The trial surrounding the Goldhelmet Knightclub's match fixing has come to a close.
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: Although its representative continues to deny the charges, the evidence is conclusive, and the court has made a fair judgment. The knightclub will face a large fine and a six month ban from the Major...
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: Next up, on entertainment news, Rose Knight has once again denied the rumors with Full Moon Knight, maintaining that the photos were forged and asking fans for their continued support...
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: I've heard the Goldhelmet K.C.'s a dishonest bunch. I've lost so much money on their matches! They finally got what's coming to them!
attributes.name: Drunk Customer

attributes.content: They only have themselves to blame. They've done plenty of terrible things, but their worst crime? Not hiring a better lawyer.
attributes.name: Big Drinker Customer

attributes.content: Huh? What're you talking about? If they're guilty, they're guilty. No lawyer out there can twist the truth.
attributes.name: Drunk Customer

attributes.content: Justice is never late. Anyone who commits a crime will get their punishment in the end.
attributes.name: Drunk Customer

attributes.content: I wouldn't know if justice is ever late or absent, but if you ever commit a crime, you'd best be careful not to leave any evidence.
attributes.name: Big Drinker Customer

attributes.content: Hello? It's me. I'm still on vacation, but I'm available if you need me.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: You call that a vacation? You clearly have the energy to take on other cases. You're behind the Goldhelmet affair, right?
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Isn't this what you wanted, though? If we stir up trouble for them, they won't have the energy to keep haranguing us about Razor Knight.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: I'm more curious how you persuaded the witness to report this, in spite of the risks.
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: The power of anger can be pretty scary. If you give someone in despair the slightest push, what happens next follows naturally.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: I couldn't afford to leave any tracks, and this way puts the wife's mind at ease, too. I guess it's a win-win situation?
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: I can more or less already see what excuse you've prepared for this... Honestly, I have a newfound respect for you. You're a great fit for this profession, Deszcz.
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Thank you very much. I'll treasure my job here at the law firm.
attributes.name: Deszcz

attributes.content: ...I'm not enjoying this, am I?
attributes.name: Deszcz
